content:
Inherited mutations in homologous recombination (HR) repair genes (e.g., BRCA1/2) lead to increased DSB accumulation and higher neoplasia risk.  
*Supporting evidence:* BRCA1/2 mutations compromise HR, leading to genomic instability and breast/ovarian cancer [Roy 2012, Nat Rev Cancer; "BRCA1 and BRCA2: cancer risk and therapeutic response"].

---
